heroComponent.title: Report Abuse
heroComponent.description: To report any abuse or violations of our terms, please fill out the form with all relevant details. We take all reports seriously and will investigate promptly. Protecting our community is our priority. If you believe content violates our policies, let us know and we will take swift action.

abusePolicy.name: Phishing
abusePolicy.description: Phishing is one of the most common threats that every website is prone to. Usually, it consists of a fake page pretending to be a genuine page.
abusePolicy.infoRequired: Share the full live page URL

abusePolicy.name: Privacy concerns
abusePolicy.description: You can go through the privacy policy to verify the privacy concerns.
abusePolicy.infoRequired: Share the full live page URL

abusePolicy.name: Spam
abusePolicy.description: Mistrustful or unexpected emails, text or SMS are considered as spam or fraud.
abusePolicy.infoRequired: Forward the copy of email, text or SMS

abusePolicy.name: Malware
abusePolicy.description: Malware is software that can cause immediate disruption into your computer, server, client or network.

abusePolicy.name: Account changes
abusePolicy.description: We suggest you to read the terms of services that may be causing certain changes.

abusePolicy.name: Content complaints
abusePolicy.description: Our services do not allow you to post abusive content such as child pornography, disturbing adult content, or any illicit content.
